title: The Fine Details of Sales, with Andy Frisella - MFCEO25
description: There's always more to say about sales.  In this second episode dedicated to the topic, Andy Frisella talks about the importance of listening, focusing on your strengths, showing customers appreciation, and being "The Guy."
content:encoded: There's always more to say about sales.  In this second episode dedicated to the topic, Andy Frisella talks about the importance of listening, focusing on your strengths, showing customers appreciation, and being "The Guy."
